Package it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders

Class FlowDecider

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders.Decider
it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders.FlowDecider
public class FlowDecider
extends Decider
FlowDecider is an extension of Decider. It decides what is the next phase the player should be into, based upon card effects
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FlowDecider()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Phase applyMalus​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
    This method allows you to apply a malus to the players following you, all during your End phase, if certain conditions connected to the player's GodCard are verified
    static Phase buildBeforeAndAfter​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
    This method allows you to be in the Construction phase before and after the Movement phase, if certain conditions connected to the player's GodCard are verified
    static Phase extendsConstruction​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
    This method allows you to be in the Construction phase twice in a row, injecting the constraints connected to the player's GodCard
    static Phase extendsMovement​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
    This method allows you to be in the Movement phase twice in a row, injecting the constraints connected to the player's GodCard

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FlowDecider

      public FlowDecider()

  • Method Details

    • extendsConstruction

      public static Phase extendsConstruction​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
      This method allows you to be in the Construction phase twice in a row, injecting the constraints connected to the player's GodCard
      Parameters:
      gameData - the gameData all players are currently playing
      skipIfPossible - is a boolean value that is true if the Phase is skippable, false otherwise
      Returns:
      Phase.Construction if you called the method while in your first Construction phase. Otherwise, whatever is the next phase

    • extendsMovement

      public static Phase extendsMovement​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
      This method allows you to be in the Movement phase twice in a row, injecting the constraints connected to the player's GodCard
      Parameters:
      gameData - the gameData all players are currently playing
      skipIfPossible - is a boolean value that is true if the Phase is skippable, false otherwise
      Returns:
      Phase.Movement if you called the method while in your first Movement phase. Otherwise, whatever is the next phase

    • buildBeforeAndAfter

      public static Phase buildBeforeAndAfter​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
      This method allows you to be in the Construction phase before and after the Movement phase, if certain conditions connected to the player's GodCard are verified
      Parameters:
      gameData - the gameData all players are currently playing
      skipIfPossible - If the player wants to skip an optional phase even though they could perform a move.
      Returns:
      Phase.Construction if you are in the Start Phase. Otherwise, whatever is the next phase

    • applyMalus

      public static Phase applyMalus​(GameDataAccessor gameData, java.lang.Boolean skipIfPossible)
      This method allows you to apply a malus to the players following you, all during your End phase, if certain conditions connected to the player's GodCard are verified
      Parameters:
      gameData - the gameData all players are currently playing
      skipIfPossible - If the player wants to skip an optional phase even though they could perform a move.
      Returns:
      Whatever is the next phase
